name: GRAVOC
description:
GRAVOC is a fast-paced physics-based shooter that puts the players in a competition over ammunition that they can use to defeat each other. The durability of players is low so careful aim and the use of movement is the key to victory. The projectiles players fire ricochet off of walls and the ground, encouraging less straightforward methods of attack.

Features:

Physics-based gun-play - The projectiles that the player can pick up can ricochet off of walls and other structures. The player picks up ammo by using a gravity gun-styled weapon to pull the ammo to them.

Various ammo types 

- Slug shot: basic projectile with multiple bounces.

- Marksmen shot: Smaller faster projectile.

- Explosive shot: Explodes on impact. Has a knock-back effect on players.

- Scattershot: breaks apart into multiple projectiles.

Multiplayer - Two-player competitive multiplayer. Local multiplayer, compatible with Xbox gamepad.

Note- this game is still in a demo state, please tell us what you think so we can work on improvements!
